1026:3: duḥkhamityeka icchanti tacca kāryaṃ na yujyate||1||
1026:4: svayaṃ kṛtaṃ yadi bhavetpratītya na tato bhavet|
1026:6: yadyamībhya ime'nye syurebhyo vāmī pare yadi|
1026:9: svapudgalaḥ sa katamo yena duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam||4||
1026:11: pareṇa kṛtvā tadduḥkhaṃ sa duḥkhena vinā kutaḥ||5||
1026:13: vinā duḥkhena yaḥ kṛtvā parasmai prahiṇoti tat||6||
1026:15: paro hi duḥkhaṃ yatkuryāttattasya syātsvayaṃ kṛtam||7||
1026:16: na tāvatsvakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na hi tenaiva tatkṛtam|
1026:20: na kevalaṃ hi duḥkhasya cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate|
